municipality_name.instruction: Enter the name of the municipality

inter_municipality_name.instruction: Enter the name of the inter-municipality organization

logo.instruction: Provide the URL or path to the municipality logo

population.instruction: Enter the total population of the municipality

area.instruction: Enter the total area of the municipality in square kilometers

data_from_year.instruction: Enter the year from which this data was collected

total_budget.instruction: Enter the total budget of the municipality in euros

total_budget_per_person.instruction: Enter the total budget per person in euros

debt_repayment_capacity.instruction: Enter the debt repayment capacity as a ratio

debt_ratio.instruction: Enter the debt ratio as a percentage

debt_duration.instruction: Enter the debt duration in years

year.instruction: Find 3 important historical milestones concerning the municipality. Order them consecutively. This is the first one. Enter the year of the first historical milestone

milestone.instruction: Find 3 important historical milestones concerning the municipality. Order them consecutively. This is the first one. Describe the first historical milestone event
milestone.example: Création de la Communauté d'Agglomération de Dijon Métropole

year.instruction: Find 3 important historical milestones concerning the municipality. Order them consecutively. This is the second one. Enter the year of the second historical milestone

milestone.instruction: Find 3 important historical milestones concerning the municipality. Order them consecutively. This is the second one. Describe the second historical milestone event
milestone.example: Création de la Communauté d'Agglomération de Dijon Métropole. Création de la Communauté d'Agglomération de Dijon Métropole

year.instruction: Find 3 important historical milestones concerning the municipality. Order them consecutively. This is the third one. Enter the year of the third historical milestone

milestone.instruction: Find 3 important historical milestones concerning the municipality. Order them consecutively. This is the third one. Describe the third historical milestone event
milestone.example: Creation de Dijon Métropole avec 23 communes

historical_milestones.instruction: Find 3 important historical milestones concerning the inter-municipalities. Make sure they are 3 distinct and different events. Take care of this when researching the individual milestones.

theme.instruction: Find 3 important green projects concerning the municipality. This is the first one. Name the environmental theme of the project

category.instruction: Find 3 important green projects concerning the municipality. This is the first one. Name the category of the green project

description.instruction: Find 3 important green projects concerning the municipality. This is the first one. Provide a detailed description of the green project including any statistics that you find. Preferably this would include the date of the project and perhaps some other facts on how this project will help the community.
description.example: Deployment of photovoltaic panels on the roofs of public buildings (Anjou and Buffon school groups, Gymnasium, Fontaine d'Ouche stadium, etc.).

category.instruction: Find 3 important green projects concerning the municipality. This is the second one. Name the category of the green project

green_projects.instruction: Find 3 important green projects concerning the municipality. Make sure they are 3 distinct, different and representative projects. Here are some websites that might help your search and provide some context: https://francevilledurable.fr/les-realisations/carte-des-realisations/, https://plainecommune.fr/projets/grands-projets-urbains/lecoquartier-fluvial/, https://www.ecologie.gouv.fr/, https://www.iledefrance-mobilites.fr/le-reseau/projets, https://www.ademe.fr/, https://www.banquedesterritoires.fr/notre-identite, https://www.onpv.fr/, https://francevilledurable.fr/, https://www.ademe.fr/en/futures-in-transition/, https://www.caissedesdepots.fr/blog/tag/PROJET%20URBAIN.

theme.instruction: Find 3 important social projects concerning the municipality. This is the first one. Name the social theme of the project

category.instruction: Find 3 important social projects concerning the municipality. This is the first one. Name the category of the social project

description.instruction: Find 3 important social projects concerning the municipality. This is the first one. Provide a detailed description of the social project including any statistics that you find. Preferably this would include the date of the project and perhaps some other facts on how this project will help the community.
description.example: Major multiyear renovation plan for Dijon's 76 schools: budget of 75M€ including: 30M€ over 10 years for renovation and modernization, 36.7M€ to remove prefal and 4.3M€ to renovate school grounds and surroundings, e.g. Anjou nursery school (beautificatio of school interiors; Beaumarchais elementary school: renovation of sanitar facilities; Dampierre elementary school: replacement of ground-floor woodwork; Flammarion gymnasium and ALSH schoo groups: partial interior renovation, installation of roller shutters and roof repairs; Coteaux du Suzon, Plein Air and Ouest elementary school groups: renovation of flat roofs; Darcy school group: renovation of préau...).

theme.instruction: Find 3 important green projects concerning the inter-municipality. This is the first one. Name the environmental theme of the project

category.instruction: Find 3 important green projects concerning the inter-municipality. This is the first one. Name the category of the green project
category.example: Collection and sorting of household and similar waste (HHW) and treatment of household and similar waste (DMA)

description.instruction: Find 3 important green projects concerning the inter-municipality. This is the first one. Provide a detailed description of the green project including any statistics that you find. Preferably this would include the date of the project and perhaps some other facts on how this project will help the community.
description.example:
Acquisition of household waste skips, upgrading of sorting center PPI of €21 M
Deployment of the hydrogen production and distribution station with the 1st refuse collection vehicle + start-up of operations at the North station (Valmy)
Modernization of the sorting center (€2 million in 2024 and a PPI total of €29 million).
Project to modernize the waste-to-energy plant.

name.instruction: Enter the full name of the contact person. Answer with just the name, without any explanation or excuse.

title.instruction: Enter the professional title of the contact person. Answer with max 5 words, without any explanation or excuse.

title_since.instruction: Enter the date when the person started in this title. Answer with just the date, without any explanation or excuse.

birth_date.instruction: Enter the birth date of the contact person. Answer with just the date, without any explanation or excuse.

birth_place.instruction: Enter the birth place of the contact person. Answer with just the place, without any explanation or excuse.

education.instruction: List the educational background of the contact person. Be as brief, conscise and specific as possible.
education.example: Master's degree in public law and sports management from the University of Burgundy (1999), Bachelor's degree in public administration, Université Paris I Panthéon-Assas (2005), Institute for Public Management and Economic Development (IGPDE) (2006)

activities.instruction: List the professional activities of the contact person. Be as brief, conscise and specific as possible.
activities.example: 1st Vice-President of Dijon Métropole in charge of soft mobility, the bicycle plan, the European Green Capital, relations with the Département (since September 2024)

career.instruction: List the career history of the contact person. Be as brief, conscise and specific as possible.
career.example: Former French champion in 5,000 m canoe-kayak (1998), Deputy mayor of Dijon, responsible for trade, crafts and the Cour de ville project, then local democracy (2008-2014), Lecturer in Master 2 at the Faculty of Sports, University of Burgundy (2010-2014), 1st Deputy Mayor of Dijon, responsible for ecological transition, climate and the environment (2014-2024), Acting Mayor of Dijon (July 27-August 10, 2015)

name.instruction: Enter the full name of the contact person. Answer with just the name, without any explanation or excuse.

title.instruction: Enter the professional title of the contact person. Answer with max 5 words, without any explanation or excuse.
title.example: Chairman of the Dijon Metropolitan Council

title_since.instruction: Enter the date when the person started in this title. Answer with just the date, without any explanation or excuse.

birth_date.instruction: Enter the birth date of the contact person. Answer with just the date, without any explanation or excuse.

birth_place.instruction: Enter the birth place of the contact person. Answer with just the Place, without any explanation or excuse.

education.instruction: List the educational background of the contact person. Be as brief, conscise and specific as possible.
education.example: Master's degree in public law, DESS in Economics, DEA in Political Science

activities.instruction: List the professional activities of the contact person. Be as brief, conscise and specific as possible.
activities.example: Chairman, CNER (Fédération des agences d'attractivité, de développement et d'innovation) (since May 2023)

career.instruction: List the career history of the contact person. Be as brief, conscise and specific as possible.
career.example: Burgundy regional councillor (1994-2001), PS National Secretary, in charge of organization and coordination (1997-2005), General Councillor for Côte-d'Or, Dijon 5 canton (1998-2008), Mayor of Dijon (2001-2024)

contacts.instruction: Find two contacts for the municipalities and their details. Give the answer as short as possible, idealy only a few words.
